title: `forge create` not working `0: could not find artifact`
body:
Running into an issue on first contract deploy to local ganache

Running on M1 hardware

```forge create --rpc-url 127.0.0.1:7545 --private-key <private_key> src/Token.sol
compiling...
Compiling 9 files with 0.8.10
Compilation finished successfully
Compiler run successful
success.
Error:
   0: could not find artifact```

More logs 
```Location:
   /Users/runner/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/eyre-0.6.6/src/lib.rs:1164
  ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ BACKTRACE ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
   1: _main<unknown>
      at <unknown source file>:<unknown line>
   2: _main<unknown>
      at <unknown source file>:<unknown line>
   3: _main<unknown>
      at <unknown source file>:<unknown line>
   4: _main<unknown>
      at <unknown source file>:<unknown line>
   5: __mh_execute_header<unknown>
      at <unknown source file>:<unknown line>
   6: __mh_execute_header<unknown>
      at <unknown source file>:<unknown line>
   7: __mh_execute_header<unknown>
      at <unknown source file>:<unknown line>
   8: _main<unknown>
      at <unknown source file>:<unknown line>```
Can you share the code and command used to produce this error?

```
forge init test_2
cd init test_2
forge build 
forge create --rpc-url 127.0.0.1:7545 --private-key <private_key> src/Contract.sol
```

Same error generated with and without ganache running

No code changed - so just the outpu from running init. Smells like an issue w/ rust installation, but not sure if anyone has run into it before

Forge build - builds successfully
What's the contents of `out` and how did you install Foundry?
What does `forge --version` and `which forge` output? If `forge` is under `~/.cargo/bin`, you must `rm -rf ~/.cargo/bin/forge`

Hey! I am having a similar issue. I am running on an ubuntu desktop with an x86 cpu though.

This is the error I get, when I run `forge create`:
```
Error: 
   0: could not find artifact

Location:
   /home/runner/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/eyre-0.6.6/src/lib.rs:1164

  ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ BACKTRACE ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
   1: __libc_start_main<unknown>
      at <unknown source file>:<unknown line>
```

This is what I get when I run `forge --version`:
forge 0.1.0 (6547691 2022-02-21T00:27:10.478113793+00:00)

This is what I get when I run `which forge`:
/home/user/.foundry/bin/forge

> ```
> forge init test_2
> cd init test_2
> forge build 
> forge create --rpc-url 127.0.0.1:7545 --private-key <private_key> src/Contract.sol
> ```

@Rolstenhouse this error is caused by not providing the name of the contract. You only provided `src/Contract.sol` when it should be either `Contract` (name of contract) or `src/Contract.sol:Contract`. 

#819 will return a clearer error to highlight the formats accepted by the create/verify-contract commands.

Closing with #819
reopen if this is still an issue
